alert.note: Alert for Stevens (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:18PM CDT until July 26 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR EASTERN STEVENS AND WESTERN SWIFT COUNTIES... At 1018 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Hancock, or 14 miles southeast of Morris, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Morris Airport measured 60 mph winds. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morris, Appleton, Hancock, Lake Oliver, Artichoke Lake, Hagen, Danders, Holloway and Appleton Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
